meanings.definition: Identical or consistent in form, type, or nature.
meanings.sent1: The students wore uniforms shirts for the school event.
meanings.sent2: The soldiers had uniforms helmets to protect their heads.
meanings.sent3: The uniforms cupcakes at the party were all the same size and color.
meanings.sent4: The sky was filled with uniforms clouds, all perfectly shaped and spaced.
meanings.sent5: The garden was a sea of uniforms flowers, each petal exactly the same as the next.

meanings.definition: A distinctive set of clothing worn by members of a particular group.
meanings.sent1: The team's uniforms were blue and white with the team logo on the chest.
meanings.sent2: The police officers wore uniforms to show they were part of the law enforcement.
meanings.sent3: The penguins at the zoo looked adorable in their tiny uniforms tuxedos.
meanings.sent4: The forest was a sea of green, with the trees in their uniforms of leaves.
meanings.sent5: The astronauts put on their uniforms before heading to the spaceship for the mission.
